answers.answer: SOOO  GLAD to hear that!!  Hopefully she will continue down this road of  recovery!
OMG!!!!  when you never came back on here i was worried and praying!!!  i am so glad to hear she is ok!
I am so happy to hear that I have been worried about her! I hope that everything continues to get better for her! Good luck and God Bless you both!

thanks girls for thinking of us. the only problem was she was throwing up her antibiotics everytime they were given to her. so now shes on a pill form, and doing fine. shes on two different kinds and they both are very bitter strong tasting. we're not having a good two weeks or so. now i just failed my sugar test yesterday. i have to now go for a three hour test. i can't wait till all this is over, so we can relax. i never had any problems with testing with my other kids. thanks again for thinking of us. i don't want to be in another hospital again unless its for having the baby. something exciting anyway.

I am so glad to hear your daughter is doing better.  I failed both glucose tests and have been told that i have gestational diabetes.  I never had a problem with my first pregnancy so i am kinda lost.  Hope you pass, and if you dont looks like we can help eachother thru it.

question: thanks ladies for asking about my daughter!!! she was able to come home and take her antibiotics by mouth. she has to go back for another x-ray in 4 weeks. no chest tube thank goodness. its been a hard two weeks. thanks to everyone for your prayers!
title: daughters home!!!
